name: FNAF Simulator: Origins
description:
Here you can buy and play for animatronics from the fnaf game universe not only! You will also be able to play and for the animatronics, made by fans... Wait... YOU CAN ALSO PLAY AS CHARACTERS FROM YOUR FAVORITE VIDEO GAMES! Have fun! And remember that Fazbear Entertainment is about entertainment, pizza and family!


GAMEPLAY

You play as an animatronic you bought, you have the ability, awareness scale, and noise scale. A security guard is sitting nearby. Your task is to kill him, if you lose, you will have a screen that says 6 am. For the security guard the gameplay is almost identical to the original fnaf!


CHARACTERS

FNaF 1:

Freddy Fazbear, Bonnie the Bunny, Chica the Chicken, Foxy the Pirate and Golden Freddy.

FNaF 2:

Toy Bonnie, Toy Chica, Toy Freddy, Withered Bonnie, Withered Freddy, Withered Chica, Withered Foxy, Balloon Boy and Shadow Freddy.

FNaF 3:

Springtrap and Phantom Freddy

FNaF 4:

Nightmare Bonnie, Nightmare Fredbear, Nightmare,Nightmare Chica,Nightmare Freddy

FNaF SL:

8-Bit Baby/William , Funtime Freddy, Funtime Foxy and Ennard

FFPS:

Lefty, Scraptrap,Molten Freddy, and Scrap Baby

Help Wanted:

GlitchTrap

FNaC:

Candy,Cindy,Blank,Old Candy,Chester and The Rat

FNaC 2:

Withered Candy,Withered Cindy,Withered Blank,Withered Chester,The Cat and The Rat

FNaC 3:

Monster Rat,Monster Cat,Monster Vinnie and Shadow Rat

TJOC:R

Ignited Freddy and Ignited Bonnie

Fredbear's Family Dinner:

Classic Fredbear, Classic SpringBonnie

Spring location:

Fredbear and SpringBonnie

Those Nights at Rachel's:

Rachel,Doug,Pete,Bane and Ray

HOAXES:

Withered Toy Bonnie,Withered Toy Freddy,Withered Toy Chica, Golden Toy Freddy, Withered Puppet and Sparky

Fnaf Plus:

Freddy,Bonnie,Chica and Foxy

Super FNaF:

Super Freddy,Super Bonnie,Super Chica

Halloween:

Jack-O-Bonnie,Jack-O-Chica,Grim Foxy,Nightmarionne,DradBear
